site.title: WiiLink
site.description: An unofficial community homebrew project dedicated to restoring, translating and enhancing the now discontinued WiiConnect24 channels and services, including those that were not available in all regions.
site.terms: I have read and accepted the <0>Terms of Service</0> and <1>Privacy Policy</1>.
